title: Protests (negotiable instruments - checks, promissory notes)
dataVerified: Instrument details (check/note number), payee name, protest reason (dishonored/non-payment), notary certification, notary name, notary commission, protest date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged protests on dishonored negotiable instruments. Domain binding verifies notary commission. UCC Article 3 compliance for commercial law. Dishonored check documentation for collection proceedings. Commercial liability establishment. Prevents payment fraud through tamper-evident protest certificates. Critical for commercial transactions where protests establish legal notice of dishonor.
